events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The system has categorized the customer's issue as related to a refund request due to incorrect delivery.
The case has been assigned to the refund specialist team to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand the issue with your order and I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us verify the issue quickly.
Here is my order number: 123456789. I have attached the photo showing that the item is not what I purchased.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5 to 7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response! I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed.
The refund has been processed in our system. If there is anything else you need, feel free to reach out anytime.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I have received the refund in full. Thank you very much for resolving this quickly and professionally.
The case has been formally closed following confirmation of the refund receipt from the customer.
